document.full_text: rookie keegan bradley defied the odds to clinch his maiden pga tour title with a gripping playoff victory over fellow american ryan palmer at the wind-buffeted byron nelson championship on sunday.
document.title: rookie bradley wins nelson in playoff with palmer
lines_and_colors: rookie keegan bradley defied the odds to clinch his maiden pga tour title with a gripping playoff victory over fellow american ryan palmer at the wind-buffeted byron nelson championship on sunday.
